frame.name: Team
frame.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Team</fen> is a group with shared goals and works toward them together in a coordinated fashion.</def-root>

FE.name: Members
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the people or things that form the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Team
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the collection of entities that are the <fen>Team</fen>. </def-root>

FE.name: Aggregate_property
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes a property of the <fen>Aggregate</fen> rather than the <fen>Members</fen> and is used to tag the adjective that modifies the aggregate noun when it is unambiguous.
<ex>A <fex name="Aggregate_property">large</fex> <t>crowd</t> of hoodlums filled the plaza.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition: <def-root>The term used to refer to the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition: <def-root>The location or political locale that the Organization is contained within.</def-root>

FE.name: Domain
FE.definition: <def-root>The relevant <fen>Domain</fen> as it pertains to the <fen>Aggregate</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Activity
FE.definition: <def-root>The job, obligation, or goal worked towards jointly by the <fen>Members</fen> of the <fen>Team</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Parent_organization
FE.definition:
<def-root>The broader organization (if any) that members of a team belong to.
<ex>A <t>team</t> <fex name="Parent_organization">from the American Nutrition Council</fex> issued their report today .</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: team.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a group of people working together.

lexUnit.name: crew.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a group of people tasked together.

lexUnit.name: firefighter.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A team tasked with putting out fires or protecting fire-threatened structures.

lexUnit.name: fire fighter.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A team tasked with putting out fires or protecting fire-threatened structures.
